name: Explosive Delivery (David Xu)
description:
Get that pill-shaped thing to the end zone!

Use explosions to push away obstacles and also help you deliver the object. The object is kind of fragile. Try not to hit the walls too often... (An experiment with indirect control) There is only a limited number of explosions for each level!

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button - Explode!
  • Mouse Scroll Wheel - Change the radius of explosions.
  • Press R to restart the current level.
